Interface FlipFitGymOwnerDaoInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitGymOwnerDaoImpl
public interface FlipFitGymOwnerDaoInterface
The `FlipFitGymOwnerDaoInterface` defines the data access object (DAO) contract for `GymOwner` entities. It specifies the methods for interacting with a data source (e.g., a database) to perform operations related to gym owner data.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    create(int userId, String accountNumber)
    Creates a new gym owner record in the data source, linking it to an existing user.
    void
    deleteByUserId(int userId)
    Deletes a gym owner record from the data source by their user ID.
    GymOwner
    get(int gymOwnerId)
    Retrieves a single `GymOwner` object from the data source using their unique gym owner ID.
    List<GymOwner>
    getAllGymOwners()
    Retrieves a list of all gym owners in the system.
    List<GymOwner>
    getByStatus(String status)
    Retrieves a list of all gym owners who have a specific status.
    GymOwner
    getByUser(User user)
    Retrieves a `GymOwner` object from the data source using a `User` object.
    GymOwner
    getGymOwnerByCredentials(String username, String password)
    Authenticates a gym owner by their credentials and retrieves their full `GymOwner` object.

  • Method Details

    • create

      int create(int userId, String accountNumber) throws SQLException
      Creates a new gym owner record in the data source, linking it to an existing user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique ID of the user record to associate with the new gym owner.
      accountNumber - The bank account number of the gym owner.
      Returns:
      The generated `gymOwnerId` of the newly created gym owner.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • getByUser

      GymOwner getByUser(User user) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a `GymOwner` object from the data source using a `User` object. This method is typically used to fetch gym owner-specific details after a generic user login.
      Parameters:
      user - The `User` object containing the generic user details.
      Returns:
      A `GymOwner` object if a corresponding record is found; otherwise, `null`.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • getGymOwnerByCredentials

      GymOwner getGymOwnerByCredentials(String username, String password) throws SQLException
      Authenticates a gym owner by their credentials and retrieves their full `GymOwner` object.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the gym owner.
      password - The password of the gym owner.
      Returns:
      A `GymOwner` object if a matching record is found; otherwise, `null`.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • deleteByUserId

      void deleteByUserId(int userId) throws SQLException
      Deletes a gym owner record from the data source by their user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique ID of the user whose gym owner record is to be deleted.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • getByStatus

      List<GymOwner> getByStatus(String status) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of all gym owners who have a specific status. This can be used to filter for pending, approved, or other statuses.
      Parameters:
      status - The status to filter gym owners by (e.g., "PENDING," "ACTIVE").
      Returns:
      A list of `GymOwner` objects with the specified status.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • get

      GymOwner get(int gymOwnerId) throws SQLException
      Retrieves a single `GymOwner` object from the data source using their unique gym owner ID.
      Parameters:
      gymOwnerId - The unique ID of the gym owner to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The `GymOwner` object if found; otherwise, `null`.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • getAllGymOwners

      List<GymOwner> getAllGymOwners() throws SQLException
      Retrieves a list of all gym owners in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of all `GymOwner` objects.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
